name: Last Gay Saloon On The Asteroid Belt (Gay Western Jam Prototype)
name_original: Last Gay Saloon On The Asteroid Belt (Gay Western Jam Prototype)
description:
A dust cloud billows from across the asteroid, carried by the solar winds. Behind you, the furthest planet of your system, a thriving settlement on the edges of civilization. Ahead of you, deep space; a vast ocean of uncertainty, the new new western frontier. Tomorrow, you set off into the unknown. Your objective? 

Irrelevant. For now, you're just looking for a bed to sleep in and maybe a partner to have a little fun with. Ride 'em, cowboy!

A  queer space-western speed-dating sim, where you drink with, chat up and (if you're lucky) bed one of many unique characters.

Developer: jHomps (https://jhompsgamedev.itch.io)

Artist: bynarymind (https://twitter.com/bynarymind)

Gay Western Jam Prototype Features:

  • 1/3 intended unique character encounters
